divs: sighting detailsi'm home for the summer from college and my temporary home is in our camper out in the front yard. last night, 7\27\12, at about 3 in the morning i woke up when i heard a loud car go by. i lay awake for a moment and was looking out the window of the van facing east. it was at that moment that a small red light came into my field of view from behind the pitch of my house. it shot to the left about an inch (relative to my distance), paused a moment, disappeared, then reappeared almost instantly another inch or so to the left except joined by a second identical red light. the right most light then flashed as it merged into the light to the left and they both surged a brighter red as they sped away in the direction they came from (most likely south) and disappeared behind the pitch of my roof again. i did not see them emerge from the other side. the whole event lasted about 4 or 5 seconds. i don't know if this is relevant, but i had dreamed i had seen a ufo for the first time 2 days prior to this sighting.
